p: For Raman analyses, micro-Raman spectroscopy (Horiba Jobin Yvon, Labram HR) was used with green laser (514.53 nm). Spectra were produced with wavelengths 300–3000 cm −1 using LabSpec 5 software and they were compared to spectra library collected from the literature (Frère et al. 2016; Zhang et al. 2016; Crawford and Quinn 2017).
